name: Chained Cars: Race Speed
description:
Chained Cars: Race Speed will give you an immersive driving experience by stimulating your brain with more sensible crashes and jumps.The task is to control your car with the speed of your chained AI car. Maintain very proper speed to avoid aggressive crashes. Here you can find how difficult the city car driving will be, with more speed breakers and road diversions. We added some extra off-road obstacles to make your chained car ride really tougher.
Features
• Realistic Car physics
• Awesome 3d environment
• Multiple chained cars
• Super luxury cars to chose and drive
